title: Greater Invisibility
content:
Greater Invisibility Level 4 Illusion Spell Turn a creature Invisible. Attacks against it have Disadvantage. It attacks with Advantage. Invisibility breaks when you fail increasingly harder Stealth Checks on attacking, casting spells or interacting with items. 10 turns Melee Concentration Action Level 4 Spell Slot
